summary: Here is a plug in for ninja weapons / armors / spells that I made to give a little ninja fun for skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
EDIT:

DREADOWL is my new user name on Bethesda.net.  I am uploading this mod under that username.


Welcome to my Ninjahkiin Mod!
This is my attempt at bringing ninja style into Skyrim with Tachis, Armors and Spells! By retexturing the Akaviri blade into 7 colors and supplying both one and two handers you will certainly enjoy a little ninja action. 

[b]Due to crashes I have rebuilt this mod from scratch. All bugs should be fixed now.... and with new spells![/b] 

[img]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j130/Owlburgers46/rateup_zpsb8479bce.png[/img] Please, if you enjoy this mod!

Now available on Nexusmods.com
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61367/?]Ninjahkiin on Nexusmods[/url][www.nexusmods.com] 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

Weapons:

Weapons are slightly stronger than Daedric weapons and require Daedric smithing for double temper.

[b][i]Tachi[/i][/b] - Two Handed 
[b][i]Uchigatana[/i][/b] - One Handed 
[b][i]Ninjahkiin Bow[/i][/b] - Silent Weapon 

Sets:

[b][i]Ninja's Heart[/i][/b] - An expensive and enchanted 2 hander. 

[b][i]Ash[/i][/b] - Black [i](both are silent and best for sneak attacks)[/i] 

[b][i]Autumn[/i][/b] - Orange 
[b][i]Crimson[/i][/b] - Red 
[b][i]Emerald[/i][/b] - Green 
[b][i]Heavenly[/i][/b] - White 
[b][i]Royal[/i][/b] - Purple 
[b][i]Sky[/i][/b] - Blue 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

Armor:

Light and Heavy are slightly stronger than Dragon armors and both require Dragon smithing for double temper. Each share similiar enchants but unique enchantments cannot be disenchanted. 

[b][i]Cloth[/i][/b] (Walker Set) 
[b][i]Light[/i][/b] (Shadow Set) 
[b][i]Heavy[/i][/b] (Striker Set) 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

Spells / Abilities:

[b][i]Call Brethren[/i][/b] - (Power) Summons 3 ninjas to fight for you at 1/3 your current level each once a day. 

[b][i]Chi Walk[/i][/b] - (Power) Alows you to become ethereal which negates damage and you won't be able to attack. You regain mana and stamina. Useable once a day. 

[b][i]Up in Smoke[/i][/b] - (Power) Allows you to become invisible once a day. 

[b][i]Smoke on the Water[/i][/b] - (Ability) Allows you to walk on water for 15 seconds only while sneaking. 

[b][i]Stealth Sight[/i][/b] - (Lesser Power) Toggled Night Eye 

[b][i]Five Finger Death Punch[/i][/b] - (Ability) 15 points of unarmed damage at all times. (Stronger than Khajiit Racial) 

[b][i]Distract[/i][/b] - (Lesser Power) Distracts enemies to targeted location. 

[b][i]Float like a butterfly...[/i][/b] - (Spell) Fires bees at the target for poison damage and causes them to flee if under 50% health 

[b][i]Firefly Candle[/i][/b] - (Spell) Fires a Firefly at a target location that makes a ball of light. 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

If you want a better Alchemy tree for poisons[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=364514144] Check out my Owlburgers' Perk Overhaul[/url] mod. 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

Merchant:

[b][i]Shadowy Stranger[/i][/b] - Located in the Winking Skeever in Solitude. Usually he's by the bar and he IS a ninja so you might miss him. 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

Versions:

V1.0 - Uploaded 
V2.0 - Mod Rebuilt 
V2.1 - Fix Ninja Brethren voice bug. 
V2.2 - Changed weapon names 
V2.3 - New Sword and Spell 
V2.4 - Added two new spells 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

This is a plugin .esp with no replacers and all original files. There is no special scripting so uninstalling shouldn't have problems uninstalling with your save game. However, you should back up your original save game with ALL MODS to eliminate the chance of corrupting your save game. 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

F.A.Q.s:

Q. Where can I find the weapons, armors and spells? 
A. Learn to read descriptions. You buy them from the Merchant. 

Q. Does this mod require any DLCs? 
A. No, this is a vanilla mod. 

Q. Will this mod conflict with other mods? 
A. No, this is a plug in file and shouldn't conflict with any other mod as all tags are unique.
author: Owlburgers
